entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 1 "Just a Shepherd Boy"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 1 "Just a Shepherd Boy"
media:group.media:description:
Are you important to Jesus? What about your parents, or your friend next door? God thinks all people are important. Even a little shepherd boy named David.
"People look at the outside of a person, but the Lord looks at the heart." 1 SAMUEL 16:7, ICB.
God's people think everyone is valuable and important.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 2 "Best Friends"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 2 "Best Friends"
media:group.media:description:
Who is your best friend? What do you like to do together? David and Jonathan were best friends who loved each other.
"Jonathan . . . loved [David] as himself." 1 SAMUEL 18:3, NIV.
True friends love each other.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 3 "Caught In A Cave"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 3 "Caught In A Cave"
media:group.media:description:
Has anyone done something unkind to you? What did you do? David shows us how to do good to someone who is mean to us.
We can do good even when others aren't nice to us. "Let us not become weary in doing good." Galations 6:9 NIV
Download at www.vimeo.com/channels/gracelink more at gracelink.net/​podcast

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 4 "Promises Are For Keeping"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 4 "Promises Are For Keeping"
media:group.media:description:
People who love Jesus keep their promises.
"We have promised by the Lord that we will be friends." 1 SAMUEL 20:42, ICB.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 8 "Three Times A Day"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 8 "Three Times A Day"
media:group.media:description:
Do you like talking to your friends? You can talk to Jesus just like a friend anytime, anywhere, about anything, just as Daniel did.
Memory Verse -- "[Daniel] prayed, giving thanks to his God". DANIEL 6:10, NIV.
We worship God when we pray.
Download this video at www.vimeo.com/sabbathschool more at gracelink.net/​podcast

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 9 "A Special Coat"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 9 "A Special Coat"
media:group.media:description:
Think about a favorite gift your mom or dad has given you. Joseph's father gave him a special gift. And so did
"Your heavenly Father will give good things to those who ask him." MATTHEW 7:11, ICB.
God gives us good gifts because He loves us.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 10 "Who Cares"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 10 "Who Cares"
media:group.media:description: Is there anything you are afraid of? Joseph was afraid, but he decided to trust in God. Memory Verse -- When I am afraid, I will trust in you. PSALM 56:3, NIV. When we are afraid, we can trust in God.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 11 "Joseph Goes To Jail"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 11 "Joseph Goes To Jail"
media:group.media:description:
Can you think of the best thing that's ever happened to you? What about the worst thing? Did you know God was with you both times, just as He was with Joseph?
"Nothing can separate us from the love God has for us." ROMANS 8:38, 39, ICB.
God is with us in good times and in bad.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 12 "A Wise Choice"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 12 "A Wise Choice"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever been asked to do something that was really hard? Joseph was asked to tell Pharaoh about some dreams, but he couldn't do it alone.
"I cannot do it, . . . but God will." GENESIS 41:16, NIV.
God can help us do anything.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 13 "Joseph Forgives His Brothers"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 2 Episode 13 "Joseph Forgives His Brothers"
media:group.media:description:
Has anyone done something really, really mean to you? Did you forgive them? Was it easy to do? Joseph's brothers had done something really, really mean to him.
"Forgive as the Lord forgave you." COLOSSIANS 3:13, NIV.
We can forgive others
